channel.title: writings on Isaac Tay - Startups by Day, Standup by Night
channel.description: Recent content in writings on Isaac Tay - Startups by Day, Standup by Night

item.title: First smart contract deployed
item.description: Deployed my first smart contract on 10 October 2021 on the Binance Smart Chain. Contract is based on the ERC721 standard and to help solve the problem of tracking lineage.

item.title: Posts on LinkedIn about Talent
item.description: A series of posts on LinkedIn on the challenges faced in a competitive landscape to establish the supply lines for talent.
